Class ObligatoryFunction1

  • java.lang.Object
    • ObligatoryFunction1

  • public class ObligatoryFunction1
extends java.lang.Object
    The class which purpose is to cut out the frame.
    Author:
    Robert Kubica

      • all_chosen_images

        static java.util.HashMap<javax.swing.JButton,java.io.File> all_chosen_images
        Images as files which are values for JButtons.

      • all_images

        static java.util.List<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> all_images
        The list for selected images from given directories.

      • all_images_after

        static java.util.List<java.io.File> all_images_after
        The list for all images (as files) on which there were proceed cut out function.

      • all_images_after_list

        static java.util.List<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> all_images_after_list
        The list for all images on which there were proceed cut out function.

      • black_or_white

        static int black_or_white
        The variable storing option of cutting. 1- cut out the black background. 2 - cut out the white background.

      • treshold

        static double treshold
        The variable storing tolerance for the brightness of the background which should be cut. If it is high then the more brighter pixel will be cut including the darker pixels too.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ObligatoryFunction1

        constructor
        Parameters:
        mode - which background should be cut.
        treshold - Tolerance of the pixel to cut.

      • cutFrame

        static java.awt.image.BufferedImage cutFrame(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img_to_cut)
        Main function where there is proceeding cutting of the background.
        Parameters:
        img_to_cut - The image on which there will be proceed cutting function.
        Returns:
        The image without white or black background.

      • cutOut1

        static java.util.List<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> cutOut1()
        The method which perform cutting the background on all images saved in the list(as BufferedImage) with selected images.
        Returns:
        List of the images as BufferedImage without the background.
